review_data.title: Beste Tantanmen Ramen in Zürich!
review_data.content: Ganz einfach: Wer im Winter auf Ramen nicht verzichten kann/will, unbedingt hingehen und die Tantanmen Ramen bestellen!

review_data.title: Tasty!
review_data.content: This restaurant is in the lobby of the Hotel Seehof where I was staying, so I went down for a quick dinner. The ramen was very tasty, at a reasonable (for Zurich) price, and the wait staff was pleasant. There's an outdoor seating area also.

review_data.title: Authentic. Cute. Delightful
review_data.content: A delightfully authentic ramen bar. Calm, composed and with a pleasant atmosphere. Staff welcoming and friendly. Fresh food prepared by experienced cooks!

review_data.title: Disappointed
review_data.content: Ramen were bland, especially the vegetarian ones. Starter tapas were ok, but not exciting in any way. Will not be back. Also, the ramen noodles had the consistency of pot noodles. Not good enough.

review_data.title: Disappointed by the Ramen

review_data.title: Outstanding!
review_data.content: A great noodle restaurant, with a small menu and very simple but utterly delicious food. Well worth a visit if you want a light dinner.
